title: Gene therapy restores hand function after spinal cord injury in rats

title_detail.value: Gene therapy restores hand function after spinal cord injury in rats

summary: Researchers have shown that rats with spinal cord injuries can re-learn skilled hand movements after being treated with a gene therapy that could be switched on and off using a common antibiotic.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have shown that rats with spinal cord injuries can re-learn skilled hand movements after being treated with a gene therapy that could be switched on and off using a common antibiotic.
